title: Citi Inaugurates New Offices at Abu Dhabi Global Market
summary: Abu Dhabi, U.A.E. – Citi announced the opening of its new offices at the Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), Abu Dhabi's international financial center.
tag-1: Citi Inaugurates New Offices at Abu Dhabi Global Market
tag-2: Abu Dhabi, U.A.E. – Citi announced the opening of its new offices at the Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM), Abu Dhabi's international financial center.
tag-3: H.E. Ahmed Ali Al Sayegh, ADGM Chairman, attended the inauguration ceremony, joining Citi executives David Livingstone, CEO for Europe, Middle East and Africa; Atiq Rehman, CEO for Middle East and Africa; and Elissar Farah Antonios, Cluster Head for UAE, Iraq and Levant.
tag-4: "Citi continues to support the UAE's growth and progress by investing in the country's robust financial sector," said Livingstone. "We are delighted to deploy our best-in-class global capabilities out of ADGM, which strengthens our presence in Abu Dhabi, for the benefit of our clients and partners."
tag-5: Citi's ADGM branch, located in ADGM Square Al Sila Tower, will provide cutting-edge liquidity management services to clients establishing regional treasury centers in the UAE, and will offer the full range of Citi's institutional banking capabilities.
tag-6: "Abu Dhabi is an important market with tremendous potential," said Antonios. "The ADGM platform complements our existing footprint in the region and enables us to engage in a wide spectrum of wholesale banking businesses."
tag-7: In October, Citi obtained a license from ADGM's Financial Services Regulatory Authority to set up a branch of Citibank NA at ADGM.
tag-8: Citi is present in 25 markets in the Middle East and Africa region, and offers services including Corporate & Investment Banking, Capital Markets, Sales & Trading, Transactions Services, Private Banking and Islamic Banking. Citi also offers Consumer Banking in two markets, the UAE and Bahrain.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
